reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: Installed free version to test before buying the app. Selected Christian genre, but shows only one Korean station. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Roelof Du Plessis

reviews.title: CRAP APPLICATION
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t wokr properly.....
reviews.author: Raj Syangbo

reviews.title: Great Potential ... But!
reviews.comment: We need the ability to set the PRIMARY LANGUAGE as currently all station information is only in Chinese. Once resolved we can gain full use of this promising app. ALSO, remove the irritating startup adverts page.
reviews.author: Bruce Senator

reviews.title: Uninstalled.
reviews.comment: Constant swapping between portrait and landscape. Starts with irritating page of adverts. Takes an age to connect while making stupid squaking noises.
reviews.author: Mike Johnson

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I installed to check how it works before installing the pay version but did not work on galaxy note 2
reviews.author: Noe Garcia

reviews.title: OK, but could do better.
reviews.comment: Seems to work well on my bedside Nexus 7. I like the way I can have my favourite stations saved. Tuning is quick and sound quality good. But it keeps flipping into portrait mode! My Nexus 7 is in its landscape dock: the radio itself is in landscape but when I select another station it switches to portrait! Otherwise five stars.
reviews.author: Steven Price

reviews.title: Shuts off all the time
reviews.comment: I wouldn\'t buy it. Its like the rest. Can\'t get the music there for even a couple of days. Radio on Droid is polluted with lame-o\'s.
reviews.author: Roger King

reviews.title: Constant crash.
reviews.comment: I baught this a long time ago for iPhone, then again for the Ipad and nearly for (the 3rd time) my S3 phone, but on here it just constantly crashes. Oh well 2 outa 3 ain\'t bad...
reviews.author: Jezz Doobie

reviews.title: Never ending updates
reviews.comment: Kept updating and updating and updating and updating for a couple if days. Uninstalling so that my notification area is freed up for useful notifications.
reviews.author: Milad Ghafoori

reviews.title: Looks pretty but is useless
reviews.comment: Unable to connect to server / find radio stations.
reviews.author: Maddog Rogue

reviews.title: works like a charm
reviews.comment: So far the best android streaming radio with the large amount of stations. Other streaming radios are missing my favorite radio stations. There is just one missing feature to make RadiON perfect - the stream recording. Then I will rate it full. ...or buy it if this is a paid feature.
reviews.author: Martin Lipocky

reviews.title: Connecting lasts eternity
reviews.comment: Good luck if I can connect to ANY station. Keeps connecting. TuneIn does it in seconds. I9305 LTE JB 4.1.2 WiFi 30 Mbs
reviews.author: Raymund Dobay

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: I am the CEO of this program what\'s worng
reviews.author: Tyler Van Den Enden

reviews.title: Nice UI, bad usability.
reviews.comment: Seriously, I found a station through search. I am listening to it and I love it. I am trying for half an hour to find a way to add it to the favorites but I can\'t. The only way is to use search again. Why?   Also the app should respond to Android\'s search button.
reviews.author: Marios Andreopoulos

reviews.title: I dnt know
reviews.comment: Neither bad or good nice graphics has potentiall scrap is crashing
reviews.author: ker der

reviews.title: Excelleht
reviews.comment: Perfect apps you won\'t find something else.
reviews.author: Mokamad Mentang

reviews.title: Pretty but limited
reviews.comment: App is certainly good looking, and as skeuomorphic as it gets, which is fine. But is lacking in some functions that should be accessible from the main screen. Particularly absent is the ability to star a station from the main screen, have to dig back through the search function to locate and star the station I\'m already listening to. Also really needs to hook into the lockscreen audio controls. Will be looking for a more functional app.
reviews.author: Lincoln Black

reviews.title: Fake
reviews.comment: Its useless nothing work its a crap I don\'t like it it can\'t even get any radio
reviews.author: Vicent Tayigika

reviews.comment: Got sick of \'\' station  information  not found \'\'  on SHOUTcast.  Uninstalled
reviews.author: Greg M

reviews.comment: :D
